mapper.insert: insert into board (num, writer, title, content, reg_date, boardnum, tablenum, files, stars) values( board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{boardnum}, 99, #{files}, #{stars} )
mapper.select: select NVL(max(num), 0) from board where tablenum=99
select num from board where tablenum=99 and boardnum=#{boardnum}
select count(*) from board where tablenum=99 and boardnum=0
select * from (select b.*, rownum r from (select * from board where tablenum=99 and boardnum=0 order by reg_date desc) b) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select round(avg(stars), 1) from board where num=#{num} and tablenum=99
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num} and tablenum=99
mapper.select: select * from board where num = #{num} and tablenum=99
select count(*) from files where boardnum=#{num} and tablenum=99
select filename from files where boardnum=#{num} and tablenum=99
mapper.update: update board set writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where boardnum=#{num} and tablenum=99
select * from board where boardnum=#{num} and tablenum=99 order by reg_date desc
mapper.update: update board set stars=stars+#{stars} where num=#{boardnum} and tablenum=99
update board set likes=likes+1 where num=#{num} and tablenum=99
